scripts.build-npm: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && babel src/components -d dist --copy-files && babel package.json -d dist --copy-files && babel README.md -d dist --copy-files
scripts.publish-npm-patch: npm --no-git-tag-version version patch -f && npm run build-npm && cd dist && npm publish && cd ..
scripts.publish-npm-minor: npm --no-git-tag-version version minor -f && npm run build-npm && cd dist && npm publish && cd ..
scripts.publish-npm-major: npm --no-git-tag-version version major -f && npm run build-npm && cd dist && npm publish && cd ..
